title: Dilemma
desc:
Post 413
- Next player can only play <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:green:1106234108042031166> cards on that turn. If they play a <:green:1106234108042031166> card, you (whoever played 413) and that player discard 2 cards. If they play a <:red:1106234051129507932> card, you and that player draw 2 cards. If neither <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:green:1106234108042031166> is played, nothing happens.
